meanings.definition: A nucleotide that consists of a single nucleotide unit.
meanings.sent1: The scientist studied the mononucleotide under the microscope.
meanings.sent2: DNA is made up of mononucleotides.
meanings.sent3: The mononucleotide decided to go solo and break away from the nucleotide group.
meanings.sent4: Each mononucleotide is like a tiny building block in the structure of life.
meanings.sent5: The mononucleotide stood out like a single puzzle piece waiting to be connected.

meanings.definition: A molecule that serves as a building block for nucleic acids.
meanings.sent1: The mononucleotide played a crucial role in the creation of DNA.
meanings.sent2: Cells use mononucleotides to construct RNA.
meanings.sent3: The mononucleotide was proud to be part of the nucleic acid construction crew.
meanings.sent4: In the genetic blueprint, each mononucleotide is like a small brick in a wall.
meanings.sent5: The mononucleotide was the foundation stone for the DNA tower of life.
